I really wish we had more derpy freak Tanks like {{champion:154}} and {{champion:36}}. Two of my all-time favorite champions both Thematically, and gameplay-wise. Jinx is right up there two in among the myriad of Zaun-Piltover Champions...

Come to think of it, Riot should just keep releasing Piltover and Zaun Champions and I'll remain happy.

Piltover event Rito plz?

If you are going to rework Mundo, please leave what makes him "Mundo" (such as cleavers and insane health regen (But that spot has kinda been taken by Garen)) and not completely gut him like some other reworks lately
